mapper.select: select p.img_name, p.product_name, d.order_id, d.product_id, d.count, d.orderdetail_price,o.order_name, o.order_email, o.order_tel, o.d_name, o.d_tel, o.d_address1, o.d_address2 from orderdetail d, orders o, product p where d.order_id=o.order_id and p.product_id = d.product_id and o.order_id = #{order_id}
select c.cart_num,c.product_id,p.product_name, p.product_price,p.img_name, c.count from cart c, product p where c.product_id = p.product_id and uid = #{uid}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO orderdetail (order_id,product_id,count,orderdetail_price) SELECT (select max(order_id) from orders),product_id,count,price FROM cart WHERE uid = #{uid}
insert into cart(uid, product_id, count, price) values( #{uid}, #{product_id}, #{count}, #{price})
